name: Summing Amplifier
description: Inverting summing amplifier with three inputs. Output is the inverted weighted sum of all inputs, with gain set by the ratio of feedback resistor to input resistors.
design_equations: Equal-weight: R1 = R2 = R3 = Rin, gain per input = Rf / Rin
netlist:
* Summing Amplifier
.param R1=10k
.param R2=10k
.param R3=10k
.param Rf=10k
.subckt ideal_opamp inp inn out
E1 out 0 inp inn 100k
.ends ideal_opamp
V1 in1 0 dc 0 ac 1
V2 in2 0 dc 0
V3 in3 0 dc 0
R1 in1 vminus {R1}
R2 in2 vminus {R2}
R3 in3 vminus {R3}
Rf vminus out {Rf}
X1 0 vminus out ideal_opamp
